verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1889>'Aha,<s%> the <S%H1817>gateway<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> is <S%H7665>broken;<s%> it has <S%H5437>opened<s%> to me. I shall be <S%H4390>filled,<s%> [now that] she is <S%H2717>laid<s%> <S%H2717>waste,<s%>'

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> you, O <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> up <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, as the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5927>brings<s%> up its <S%H1530>waves.<s%>

'And they will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> and <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> her <S%H4026>towers;<s%> and I will <S%H5500>scrape<s%> her <S%H6083>debris<s%> from her and <S%H5414>make<s%> her a <S%H6706>bare<s%> <S%H5553>rock.<s%>

'She will be a <S%H9298>place<s%> for the <S%H9298>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> 'and she will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H957>spoil<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

'Also her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are on the <S%H7704>mainland<s%> will be <S%H2026>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> with <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H6571>cavalry,<s%> and a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>army.<s%> <S%H6951><s%>

"He will <S%H2026>slay<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> on the <S%H7704>mainland<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and he will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H1785>siege<s%> <S%H1785>walls<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H8210>cast<s%> up a <S%H5550>mound<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H6965>raise<s%> up a <S%H6793>large<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

"And the <S%H4239>blow<s%> of his <S%H6904>battering<s%> <S%H6904>rams<s%> he will <S%H5414>direct<s%> against your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and with his <S%H2719>axes<s%> he will <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> your <S%H4026>towers.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Because<s%> of the <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses,<s%> the <S%H80>dust<s%> [raised by] them will <S%H3680>cover<s%> you; your <S%H2346>walls<s%> will <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H6571>cavalry<s%> and <S%H1534>wagons<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> when he <S%H935>enters<s%> your <S%H8179>gates<s%> as men <S%H3996>enter<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H1234>breached.<s%>

"With the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> he will <S%H7429>trample<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2351>streets.<s%> He will <S%H2026>slay<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and your <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4676>pillars<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

"Also they will <S%H7997>make<s%> a <S%H7997>spoil<s%> of your <S%H2428>riches<s%> and a <S%H962>prey<s%> of your <S%H7404>merchandise,<s%> <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H5422>destroy<s%> your <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H7760>throw<s%> your <S%H68>stones<s%> and your <S%H6086>timbers<s%> and your <S%H6083>debris<s%> into the <S%H4325>water.<s%>
"So I will <S%H7673>silence<s%> the <S%H1995>sound<s%> of your <S%H7892>songs,<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H3658>harps<s%> will be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H6706>bare<s%> <S%H5553>rock;<s%> you will be a <S%H9298>place<s%> for the <S%H9298>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets.<s%> You will be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> for I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> to <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> "Shall not the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall<s%> when the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H602>groan,<s%> when the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> <S%H2026>occurs<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst<s%>?

"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones,<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> their <S%H4598>robes,<s%> and <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H899>garments.<s%> They will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> themselves with <S%H2731>trembling;<s%> they will <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> <S%H2729>tremble<s%> every <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and be <S%H8074>appalled<s%> at you.

"And they will <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you and <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H349>'How<s%> you have perished, O <S%H6>inhabited<s%> one, From the <S%H3427>seas,<s%> O <S%H3220>renowned<s%> <S%H1984>city,<s%> <S%H5892>Which<s%> was <S%H834>mighty<s%> on the <S%H2389>sea,<s%> She and her <S%H3220>inhabitants,<s%> <S%H3427>Who<s%> <S%H834>imposed<s%> her <S%H5414>terror<s%> On <S%H2851>all<s%> her <S%H3605>inhabitants!<s%>

<S%H6258>'Now<s%> the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> will <S%H2729>tremble<s%> On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall;<s%> Yes, the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> Will be <S%H926>terrified<s%> at your <S%H3318>passing.<s%>' "

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2717>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> like the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are not <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> when I shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> will <S%H3680>cover<s%> you,

then I shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit,<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> and I shall make you <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> like the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places,<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that you will not be <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> but I shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H9469>glory<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

"I shall <S%H5414>bring<s%> <S%H1091>terrors<s%> on you, and you will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more;<s%> though you will be <S%H1245>sought,<s%> you will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
